li.a: Measure E Bond Oversight Committee Meetings
Measure E Bond Oversight Committee Annual Report
Yes on Measure E-How we got here

div.p:
Dear Parents, Students, Staff and Community,
Effective Monday, March 16, 2020, our schools were closed in response to the COVID-19 virus and will remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Information regarding the duration of the closure and plans to continue instruction and learning can be found by going to the designated COVID-19 page - designed to keep you apprised of current information and a history of past information to track the district's response as we navigate new developments and advisories. On April 15, 2020 we issued a Remote Learning update and today (April 24, 2020) we sent information regarding a change in GRADING practices for this semester. I encourage you to visit our School Closure Website for up to date information.
Thank you for your partnership,
Mike Grove

span.strong: Navigating Remote Learning: A Webinar for LGSUHSD

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
div.span:
Many families are concerned about the impact that remote learning will have on their child’s academic journey and what role they should play along the way. Join us for a 30-45-minute webinar with Challenge Success to explore practical tips and guidelines for what families can do to best support student well-being and engagement with learning right now. There will be time for Q&A at the end.
To Register, please go to https://stanford.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_F4Moio34RFudvqMjmKxxGg

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
